sentences.en: “I don’t think we know what this virus is going to do yet, ” said one of its discoverers, Dr. Cynda Crawford of the University of Florida veterinary school.
sentences.cn: 狗流感病毒的发现者之一、佛罗里达大学兽医学院的辛恩达·克劳福德博士说：“我认为我们还不知道这种病毒传染的走向。”

sentences.en: Admission to schools of veterinary medicine is exceptionally competitive.
sentences.cn: 报考兽医学校需要经过激烈竞争.

sentences.en: At present veterinary medicine carrier in use mainly is glucose in domestic!
sentences.cn: 国内目前使用的兽药载体主要为葡萄糖!

sentences.en: Celia was admiring of Yvonne's decision to apply to veterinary college.
sentences.cn: 西莉亚对伊冯决定报考兽医学院很称赞.

sentences.en: He was still frightened of the veterinary surgeons.
sentences.cn: 他对外科兽医一直心有余悸.

sentences.en: In 2009, about 27% of math PhDs were women, but more than three-quarters of veterinary graduates were women, for example.
sentences.cn: 例如，在2009年，大约27%的数学博士为女性，但是超过四分之三的兽医毕业生为女性。

sentences.cn: 注 2: 即有关宠物在该兽医诊所的登记主人.

sentences.en: Presently he is Virology Editor - in - Chief of'Veterinary Microbiology '.
sentences.cn: 现在他是“兽医微生物学”病毒学 总编辑.

sentences.en: Such as: pesticides, fertilizers, medicine, veterinary medicine, mask powder, milk powder, spices.
sentences.cn: 如: 农药 、 化肥 、 医药 、 兽药 、 面膜粉 、 奶粉 、 调味品等.

sentences.en: The dog with brown and white splotches and his friend with gray, black and white splotches were rescued, and are in a veterinary clinic in the Ibaraki Prefecture.
sentences.cn: 那条白褐色斑点相间的狗和它的朋友，黑灰色斑点相间的狗都被救助了。 它们现在待在茨城县的一家兽医诊所里。

sentences.en: The veterinary virologist and the clinician are naturally interested in effectively combating a viral infection.
sentences.cn: 兽医病毒学家和临床医师对有效地制止病毒的感染自然会感兴趣.

sentences.en: This covers proper veterinary care, competition injuries, euthanasia and retirement.
sentences.cn: 这涵盖适当的医疗照顾 、 运动伤害 、 安乐死与退休.

sentences.en: This is the final criterion of veterinary practice.
sentences.cn: 这就是兽医业务的最终目标.

sentences.en: This veterinary product is very effective in preventing animal molt.
sentences.cn: 这种兽药对于防治兽类掉毛很有效.

sentences.cn: 去当地的兽医站或者宠物医院不就可以了么.

sentences.cn: 兽医微生物学上册, 刘荣标 编著, 艺轩图书出版社.

sentences.en: Veterinary clinics number more than 200 in Inner Mongolia.
Veterinary virology has grown immensely during the past decade.
sentences.cn: 兽医病毒学在过去十年内发展非常迅速.
